data.title: The Persepolis Fortification Texts and The Royal Road - Potts 2008
data.meta_description: The Persepolis Fortification Texts and the Royal Road- Potts 2008 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is the introduction to a collection of papers from a colloquium on the Fortification archive of Persepolis. It was organized by the Chair of Achaemenid History and Civilization and the International Network for Achaemenid Studies. The introduction provides an overview of the colloquium, which aimed to take stock of research on the Fortification archive and identify new perspectives. It also lists the various papers that were presented on topics such as the number and characteristics of tablets, find spots, multilingualism, seals and sealing practices, uninscribed tablets, and the contents of the archive relating to taxation, travel provisions, and institutional labor.
data.text: The Persepolis Fortification Texts and The Royal Road - Potts 2008
